member.name: T:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.NonAuthenticatedIdentity
member.summary: This class provides an IIdentity that is not considered authenticated. This allows a site to recognize a user without treating the user as authenticated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.NonAuthenticatedIdentity.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class representing the user with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the user on whose behalf the code is running.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.NonAuthenticatedIdentity.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class representing the user with the specified name and authentication type.
member.param: The name of the user on whose behalf the code is running.
The type of authentication used to identify the user.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.NonAuthenticatedIdentity.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the user has been authenticated.

member.name: N:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration
member.summary: The Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration namespace contains the configuration section handlers for the Commerce Server .NET Application Framework.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource
member.summary: CommerceResource represents the collection of configuration properties for a site resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator that can iterate through the property names of all the resource properties in the resource.
member.returns: An IEnumerator that can iterate through the property names.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a resource property from the based upon the property name.
member.returns: The value of the propertyName parameter.
member.param: The name of the property whose value is retrieved.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.MajorVerion
member.summary: (Obsolete) Gets a value representing the MajorVersion of the resource.
member.returns: A value that represents the version number of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.MajorVersion
member.summary: Gets a value representing the major version number of the resource.
member.returns: A value that represents the major version number of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.MinorVersion
member.summary: Gets a value representing the minor version number of the resource.
member.returns: A value that represents the minor version number of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the resource.
member.returns: A value that represents the name of the resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource.Revision
member.summary: Gets a value representing the revision number of the resource.
member.returns: A value representing the revision number of the resource.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the site to read resource configuration information. May not be null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.CopyTo(Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResource[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies all of the elements in the current instance to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index in the array.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current instance. The Array must have zero-based indexing and one-dimensional.
The zero-based index in the destination array at which storing begins.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator that can iterate through the current collection.
member.returns: An IEnumerator that can iterate through the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies all the elements in the current instance to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the elements copied from the current instance. The Array must have zero-based indexing and one-dimensional.
The zero-based index in the destination array at which storing begins.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.Count
member.summary: Gets the count of the number of elements in the CommerceResourceCollection collection.
member.returns: The number of site resources contained in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.IsSynchronized
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether access to the current CommerceResourceCollection is synchronized (thread-safe).

member.summary: Gets a from the collection, based upon the resource name.
member.returns: The object in the collection with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the resource to retrieve.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.SiteName
member.summary: Gets the name of the Commerce Site for which this collection was created.
member.returns: The name of the Commerce Site for which this collection was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CommerceServer.Runtime.Configuration.CommerceResourceCollection.SyncRoot
member.summary: Gets an object that can be used for synchronized access to the CommerceResourceCollection.
